title: Pom Poms Scrap Bag (Approx 2 Yards) by Tula Pink for Free Spirit DIY Quilt Fabric
features: Perfect for high quality quilt tops. This fabric is the top of the line. This is the same high quality fabric you would find at the best quilt shops.

The images are of the actual product taken in our photo studio. We do not alter the images. However, due to monitor display differences, the color may not look identical when you receive the product. We are confident that every collection is worth having. Happy quilting.
description: Pulled from the Pom Poms by Tula Pink for Free Spirit, this scrap bag includes 2 yards of fabric from the image shown. Each scrap bag weighs between 10 - 12 ounces, depending on the manufacturer. There are at least eight different fabrics - 2 1/2-inches to 17-inches wide by 44-inches long. This bundle was put together and machine cut in house. All fabrics are 100% cotton and quilt shop quality fabrics.
